original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, He that offereth the sacrifice of his peace offerings unto the Lord shall bring his oblation unto the Lord of the sacrifice of his peace offerings.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 화목제물을 여호와께 드리려는 자는 그 화목제물 중에서 그의 예물을 여호와께 가져오되

sentences.original_text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying
He that offereth the sacrifice of his peace offerings
shall bring his oblation unto the Lord
of the sacrifice of his peace offerings
